text: Why haven't you done your homework? Miss, it's all the cat's fault.
expected_transcript: Why haven't you done your homework? Miss, it's all the cat's fault.

text: If she had not got stuck on the tree, I would not have taken the ladder to climb it.
expected_transcript: If she had not got stuck on the tree, I would not have taken the ladder to climb it.

text: If I had not taken the ladder to climb it,I would not have needed to fix it.If I had not needed to fix it, I wouldn't have woken up the baby
expected_transcript: If I had not taken the ladder to climb it,I would not have needed to fix it.If I had not needed to fix it, I wouldn't have woken up the baby

text: If I had not woken up the baby, my mother would not have rushed out of the kitchen. If my mother had not rushed out of the kitchen, the monkey would not have got in.
expected_transcript: If I had not woken up the baby, my mother would not have rushed out of the kitchen. If my mother had not rushed out of the kitchen, the monkey would not have got in.

text: If the moneky had not got in, he would not have eaten up all the food. If he had not eaten up all the food, my father would not have bought rotis and chicken curry at the tea-shop.
expected_transcript: If the moneky had not got in, he would not have eaten up all the food. If he had not eaten up all the food, my father would not have bought rotis and chicken curry at the tea-shop.

text: If my father had not bought rotis and chicken curry at the tea shop, the dog would not have followed him home.
expected_transcript: If my father had not bought rotis and chicken curry at the tea shop, the dog would not have followed him home.

text: If the dog had not followed him home, he would not have eaten my homework.
expected_transcript: If the dog had not followed him home, he would not have eaten my homework.

text: So, you're saying the dog ate your homework?
expected_transcript: So, you're saying the dog ate your homework?
